column23:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Maximise your relaxation with this fabulous pair of shorts from Ashworth. It is best teamed with a printed tee and flip flops for a comfortable yet stylish look.

  • Product Details

  • Cream coloured shorts
column25: hook-and-bar and zip closure with buttoned tab at waistband
column27: two slant pockets at front sides
column28: embroidered branding on the right at back
column29:
two welt pockets with buttoned closure at back

  • Material & Care

  • 65% cotton
column30:
35% polyester
Machine wash cold

  • Size & Fit

  • Regular fit
    The model (height 6' and waist 32") is wearing a size 32
